about_the_game:
In a faraway universe of a faraway time......
The Space Forces stationed in the Delta Cosmos--the fourth cosmos humans have ventured into--have declared independence, waging war on the Earth Alliance. In response, the Earth Alliance dispatches a new small-scale battleship, entrusted with bringing an end to the rebellion while procuring resources and crew members in the field. Serve as Captain of this lone battleship, with the mission of destroying all enemy bases and ships in the cosmos.

About This Game:
Sidereal Wanderer, the latest battleship simulation game, combines traditional battleship gameplay with modern combat and crew members. You have no choice but to steer your lone ship and crew into the rebel forces' vast territory, crushing any and all enemy bases and ships you find scattered about the sectors.

You won't be battling entirely unassisted, however. Somewhere within the sector lies a supply base where you can replenish your energy stores and crew health. Diligently seek out the enemy and gain the upper hand in battle. May luck be on your side.

Game Features:
・Traditional game style in which the game stage is divided into 8x8 quadrants and sectors
・Recruit unique and quirky crew members and engage in one-on-one crew member battles!
・Score rankings that will put your speed and efficiency to the test
・Includes a tutorial and manual invaluable to the modern-day player

short_description: As Captain, you must lead your spaceship to defeat the rebel forces scattered across the galaxy. Scour the sectors for enemies and remain alert! Determine the right coordinates and torpedo your foe down.
